Anima mundi, or, An historical narration of the opinions of the ancients concerning man's soul after this life according to unenlight[e]ned nature / by Charles Blount, Gent. Blount, Charles, 1654-1693.

Printed, and are to be sold by Will. Cademan ..., London : 1679.
Identified in reel guide as Wing B3298. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
